meta.name: description
meta.content: The Clerk is dedicated to providing you excellent customer service and information that you need.

link.script: setEditorVariables(false, 840); function getPrintPreviewType() { return 0; } function printPreview() {pPreview(getPrintPreviewType()); }

p.span: - Increase your productivity, customize your experience, and engage in information you care about.

div.class: inner col col24 first last id6672ea64-8124-40ea-b1b1-f40e3e4a159a
inner col col24 first last idef325bd9-a2f4-4d50-a9f6-a97aaa50aee6

em.strong: Following the Governor's directive, our office will close to walk-in traffic indefinitely. During this time our staff will be leaving on Fridays at 4:30 pm until further notice.

br.br: We will continue to process renewals over the phone and online, process and record mailed documents, and plan for the adjusted Primary Election.

div.p:
We are currently working on a drop off box, however, this is not in place currently. We will let you know when this becomes available.
VEHICLE REGISTRATION RENEWALS:
OPTION 1: online renewal at www.drive.ky.gov. You will need a credit card to process payment.
OPTION 2: Mail in renewal to: Henderson County Clerk, PO BOX 374 , Henderson, KY 42419 *You will need to include last years registration & a current insurance card, along with a $2.00 mailing fee.
OPTION 3: Call 1-866-483-9679. You will need to know your title number & the last 4 of your VIN # in order to process payment, as well as a credit card.
OPTION 4: Call our office @ 270-826-3906. You will need a credit/debit card (convenience fee applies)

p.br: Visit titlesearcher.com to subscribe to our online records.

p.strong: PAYING & SEARCHING FOR DELINQUENT REAL ESTATE TAXES:
p.br:
SEARCHING: Delinquent taxes may be searched by clicking on the following link... http://taxmaster.hendersonky.us/tax_ky_web_2005/login.aspx or by visiting www.hendersonky.us (go to your government, county clerk, delinquent taxes, online tax records, taxmaster.net)
PAYMENT: You may also call in to pay delinquent taxes @ 270-826-3906 using a credit card. (convenience fee applies)
You can register to vote or update your current registration by visiting www.govoteky.com

div.p: *some of our services are not available online. We apologize for that inconvenience & ask for your patience during this time.

div.class: inner col col24 first last ida1245de7-8a7a-4172-981b-6b61b882b6ef

a.aria-label: ​2020 GENERAL ELECTION FILING INSTRUCTIONS​ Opens in new window

div.class: inner col col24 first last id71386020-61e0-44e5-b365-593030a09cce

div.p: Welcome to the online office for the Henderson County Clerk. We are dedicated to providing you excellent customer service and information that you need. Our hope is that your visit, whether online or in person, is a great experience. Thank you for visiting!
The Henderson County Clerks Office has eighteen full-time employees.

ul.li: Vehicle registration, transfers, and handicap placards

h1.strong: HENDERSON COUNTY NEEDS YOU!!! APPLY TO BECOME AN ELECTION WORKER BELOW:

h1.a: APPLICATION TO BE AN ELECTION OFFICER

div.p: *You must be a Henderson registered voter.
*You must attend at least one 2 1/2 hour election training.

div.class: inner col col24 first last id5992f75e-50fd-4c93-845a-8f73eabdeb07

div.div: 20 N Main Street, Suite 206 Henderson County Courthouse Henderson KY 42420

div.br:
Monday - Thursday
8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.
Friday
8 a.m. - 6 p.m.
During holiday weekends, we will close on Friday at 4:30 p.m.
Additional Phone Numbers
Dealer number: 270-827-6029
Election: 270-827-6013
